--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, ROD PAVEZ <grfkboyz@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Hi:
> I have a question. It states in the specs of the contest that the 
short story can exceed 3,000 words but I would like to know just how 
much can it exceed?
>  
> Thanks,
> Rod
>  

Use your best judgement for what fits your story, while targeting 
the vicinity of 3,000.  I will make sure that the judges don't count 
beans for 5 days while making a decision.

Thanks!
